c74object.name: mx-permute
c74object.description: mx-permute permutes patterns in different ways, i.e. it shifts the order of items in a pattern. Patterns can either be permuted generally, so that every combination is eventually generated, or in a circular fashion. In its general usage, it guarantees variation without repetition.

outlet.digest: Bang when highest permutation is reached

method.name: recall
method.digest: Output the permutation associated with the index

method.name: circular
method.digest: Output the circular permutation associated with the index
method.description: Circular permutations are permutations, where the order of the elements is shifted in a wraparound, circular style, e.g. 1 2 3 -> 2 3 1.

method.name: circular
method.digest: Output the anticircular permutation associated with the index
method.description: Anticircular permutations are permutations, where the order of the elements is shifted in a wraparound, circular style, but also the initial order of the items in the pattern is inversed, e.g. 1 2 3 -> 1 3 2 -> 3 2 1.

attribute.name: circ_mode
attribute.digest: Change mode of circular and anticircular messages
attribute.description: When circ_mode is 0, the circular and anticircular permutations are output in forward fashion, e.g. 1 2 3 -> 2 3 1. When circ_mode is 1, the circular and anticircular permutations are output in reverse fashion, e.g. 1 2 3 -> 3 1 2.
